Name: Collection Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Honey, spice and vodka enhanced by blackberries, with a very alcoholic edge.
History: Created in the 1990s by Matthew Randall whilst at The Collection, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Collection Cocktail contains 235 calories
